  • Packages that use org.simplity.kernel.db 
    Package Description
    org.simplity.kernel.comp  
    org.simplity.kernel.db
    classes that deal with rdbms on top of jdbc
    org.simplity.kernel.dm
    Data Model
    org.simplity.service
    as a client, this is all you need to know as to how to ask the server for a service and get response.
    org.simplity.tp  
  • Classes in org.simplity.kernel.db used by org.simplity.kernel.comp 
    Class and Description
    Sql
    A prepared statement with which to interacts with the data base.
    StoredProcedure
    A stored procedure that can be invoked from app layer.
  • Classes in org.simplity.kernel.db used by org.simplity.kernel.db 
    Class and Description
    DbAccessType
    defines the type of database access required for a service
    DbClientInterface
    Interface to be implemented by a class that wants to work with RdbDriver.
    DbDriver
    We use DbDriver as a wrapper on JDBC to restrict the features to a smaller subset that is easy to maintain.
    DbVendor
    RDBMS vendors that we can use.
    InOutType 
    ProcedureParameter
    parameter used in a prepared statement or stored procedure
    RowIterator
    Way to iterate over each resultant row of a SQL.
    SchemaDetail 
    SqlType
